棅字的基本解释

棅
bǐng
古同“柄”。

棅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》陂病切，去映，幫。］
［《集韻》補永切，上梗，幫。］
亦作“棅1”。亦作“枋3”。
(1)斧柄。引申为器物的把儿。
(2)植物的花、叶或果实跟枝或茎相连的部分。
(3)根本。
(4)权力。
(5)执掌，掌握。
(6)比喻在言行上被人抓住的把柄。
(7)量词。多用于某些带把儿的东西。

棅字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棅； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页531第20
【說文】與柄同。柯也。【唐韻】又本也，權也。【莊子·天道篇】天下奮棅而不與之偕。【管子·山權數】權棅之數，吾已得聞之矣。　又【類篇】持也。

考證：〔【莊子·天文篇】〕　謹照原書改天道篇。
棅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
棅字的起名意思

暂无。

Deceive
Basic explanation of words
Deceive
bǐng
Ancient with the "handle".
Deceive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǐng］
["Guang Yun" Pi is cut off, go to film, help. ]
["Jiyun" make up forever and cut, on the stem, help. ]
Also known as "棅1". Also known as "Fang 3".
(1) Axe handle. Extended to handle the utensils.
(2) The part where the flower, leaf or fruit of a plant is connected to the branch or stem.
(3) Basically.
(4) Power.
(5) Take control and control.
(6) It is a metaphor for being caught in words and deeds.
(7) Quantifiers. It is mostly used for something with a handle.
Deceive
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棅; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 531 20
【Said Wen】Same as handle. Ke also. [Tang Yun] This is also the original, and the right is also. [Zhuangzi·The Way of Heaven] The world is struggling and not going with it. [Guanzi·Mountain Quantum] The number of Quandi, I have heard about it.　[Class Pieces] Hold also. Textual research: [[Zhuangzi·Astronomy Chapter]] 　 I would like to change the article on the Tao of Heaven according to the original book.
